Gentlemen-
	The Imperial Japanese Department of HomeIsland Security has deemed it 
necessary to increase security for the NTHK contingent now travelling 
in the wilds of Amerique. Therefore I am bugging out for Chicago and 
will be seeing you all there Tomorrow at 06:00 hours. Be on your best 
behavior the Security Sword Specialist is in town!
-t
